General.Name: Suzhou Kelida Bldg &
General.Description: Suzhou Kelida Building& Decoration Co.,Ltd. engages in the design and construction of architectural curtain walls and architectural decoration projects in China. The company offers indoor and outdoor architectural decoration, environmental, public building decoration, architectural, landscape, municipal, geotechnical, prefabricated decoration, and steel structure engineering construction and design services; smart home products; pipeline equipment installation and construction services; and solar photovoltaic curtain wall system equipment. It also develops software; manufactures wooden doors, wooden veneers, movable furniture, etc.; manages hotel and property; develops, operates, and leases real estate; advertising; sells electronic products and mechanical equipment, prepackaged and bulk food, building materials, and fire protection facilities; dance hall entertainment; retails tobacco products; and leases engineering machinery and equipment. In addition, the company offers construction and technical consultation, e-commerce technical, accommodation, catering, cleaning, conferences, exhibitions, cultural event, sports performances, corporate image planning, and engineering management services; social and economic, information technology, and enterprise management consulting services; construction, municipal, petrochemical, mining, highway, roadbed, pavement, bridge, electric power, water conservancy and hydropower, mechanical and electrical, metallurgical, communication, earthwork, construction mechanical and electrical installation, tunnel, fire protection, waterproof, anti-corrosion and thermal insulation, highway maintenance, transportation facility, environmental protection, river and lake treatment, special, decoration, ancient building, ready-mixed concrete, foundation, intelligent building, urban and road lighting, and formwork scaffolding engineering services. Suzhou Kelida Building& Decoration Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is based in Suzhou, China.
